Question.Subject: What are the best e-card sites?
Question.Content: I am looking for some that have nice (funny or interesting) birthday e-cards, and which do not generate spam.
Question.ChosenAnswer: My sister likes Blue Mountain greetings, a friend uses eeek-mail (it's all mice cards, and very cute) and I like Birthday Alarm. I don't know the address for the eeek-mail one or Blue Mountain, but you can probably find them easily enough through your favorite search engine. www.birthdayalarm.com is the one I use so I know that address.

Answer.Content: My sister likes Blue Mountain greetings, a friend uses eeek-mail (it's all mice cards, and very cute) and I like Birthday Alarm. I don't know the address for the eeek-mail one or Blue Mountain, but you can probably find them easily enough through your favorite search engine. www.birthdayalarm.com is the one I use so I know that address.
